author: Robert C See

review: The first Chromecast device Amazon sent me did not work. I spoke with Google support and they told me the device was defective and I should return it to Amazon. Amazon was very good about the return and replaced the device with another one. However, the second device also was defective. I spoke again with Google and they instructed me to return the device to Google and they would replace it. Both Google and Amazon were excellent to work with.Third time was the charm.  The replacement Chromecast device sent from Google works great.  Set up was a snap. Everything worked exactly as advertised. I'm now able to broadcast whatever is on my laptop to my TV using the Google Chrome browser and the new Google Chromecast device.  Just remember to download the Google Chromecast add-on to the Chrome browser.I rated this transaction as 3 stars because of being shipped 2 defective devices from Amazon. Fortunately, Google is really good about helping if there are any problems.I love Google Chromecast and would highly recommend you try it.  It's the perfect add-on for a flat screen TV.
